original_title: Station masters to launch token strike at midnight today
original_body_lines: Railway station masters have decided to engage in a token strike with effect from midnight today (May 09).
Accordingly, the station masters will withdraw from duties for 24 hours until midnight tomorrow.
The Railway Station Masters’ Union (RSMU) said its token strike is in protest of the appointment of an official accused of corruption as the Deputy General Manager (Commercial) of Railways.
At the meeting of the union’s executive members today, it was decided to launch a token strike to urge the authorities to reverse the move at the earliest possible.
